'''Mojang shorts''' are short videos posted to platforms such as [[w:YouTube|YouTube]], [[w:TikTok|TikTok]], and [[w:Instagram|Instagram]], typically taking the form of a [[w:Machinima|machinima]] or animation. They can range wildly in subject, from promoting [[updates]] or [[game drop]]s, to being renditions of popular memes of the time or original comedy skits featuring ''Minecraft'' characters.
